DOC.brief_summary: This study examine whether Paula method effective treatment UI correlate LUTD symptom . We assume Paula method , simple , non-aerobic exercise method significantly decrease urinary incontinence woman MIX two randomize control trial , would also effective Multiple Sclerosis ( MS ) patient UI . The secondary aim evaluate effectiveness term MS general physical functioning , quality life sexual function detect adherence continuity six month post intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Exercises Urinary Incontinence ( UI ) Women With Multiple Sclerosis ( MS )
DOC.detailed_description: The patient examine neurologist MS clinic , Hadassah University Medical Center . Patients meet inclusion criterion receive explanation , sign inform consent . She ask complete baseline questionnaire . Than patient assign exercise group . After 12 week patient ask complete post intervention questionnaire . Apart weekly lesson , woman ask exercise home 15 minute day . After six month invite neurological examination fill additional questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: woman ≥18 year old ; complain urine leakage past four week ; MS diagnose Expanded Disability Status Scale ( EDSS ) ≤7.5 ; literate Hebrew and/or English ; suffer UI least 4 last week prior recruitment pregnant breastfeeding woman , within 12 week delivery ; 6 week abortion ; six month pelvic surgery ; symptomatic urinary tract infection ( UTI ) ; grade 2 genital prolapse , permanent catheterization urination ; woman take medication UI le 3 month woman exercise regular basis Paula method .
